dublin_core.dcvalue: Personal Digital Assistants PDAs have become a part of everyday life DermaMan is a freely available Java based dermatology specific calculator for handheld devices It includes modules to compute PASI MASI SCORAD and for calculations related to topical PUVA and Botox R administration
Indian journal of dermatology, venereology and leprology
DermaMan: scoring dermatology in your palm.
